long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your YouTube viewing experience with the YouTube Speed Controller extension! This lightweight and easy-to-use extension adds a customizable toolbar beneath YouTube videos, allowing you to easily control the playback speed. Choose from speeds of 0.5x, 1x, 1.5x, and 2x to watch videos at your preferred pace.

The toolbar is designed to be unobtrusive, with a dark, transparent background that blends seamlessly with YouTube's interface. It only appears on YouTube watch pages, ensuring it's there when you need it and out of the way when you don't.

Not only does the toolbar provide convenient speed controls, but it also syncs with YouTube's native playback rate changes. This means that even if you adjust the playback speed using YouTube's options, the toolbar will reflect the current speed, keeping you in control of your viewing experience.

Say goodbye to constantly opening the settings menu to change playback speed. Install YouTube Speed Controller today and take full control of your YouTube watching experience!
